creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
medium: Etching and aquatint in brown ink
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold November 10, 1987, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Bearded Man Holding a Book
